thread.title: Free ‘GTA Online’ DLC released alongside this week’s update
thread.title_full: Free ‘GTA Online’ DLC released alongside this week’s update | Examiner.com

author: David Stonecipher
title: Free ‘GTA Online’ DLC released alongside this week’s update
text:
GTA Online: Lowriders Update Photo courtesy of Rockstar Games, used with permission Continuing their commitment to improve the online multiplayer mode of Grand Theft Auto V , Rockstar Games released several new features to the game this week as part of the GTA Online : Lowriders Update . Detailing the new content on the official Rockstar Newswire Blog on Oct 20 , the developer discussed exactly what the latest patch added to GTA Online .
As the name of the update suggests, the most prominent new feature introduced to the game with this week’s update allows players to customize their own lowrider cars and vans. The DLC adds a new garage to the game that gives users the ability to modify specific vehicles with additional options for interiors and rims. Furthermore, the new mechanic shop is also capable of adding custom stereo systems and fully working hydraulics kits to select automobiles.
To help store users’ new customized lowriders, the update also lets gamers pick up a fourth property in GTA Online . Fans can even take advantage of a current 25 percent off of real estate purchases. Anyone who buys property now will see their rebate added to their in-game bank account at the end of the month.
In addition to the new vehicle modification options, the GTA Online: Lowriders Update also adds a series a new co-op missions that will be delivered to players from Franklin’s friend, Lamar. Those looking for more competitive content can alternately enjoy the three new adversary modes that were added to the game.
The GTA Online: Lowriders Update is now available for download on the Xbox One, Playstation 4, and PC. As with all new GTA V content, the DLC won’t be released on last-gen consoles.
